title: Introducing: Om Shankar
content:
This debut track from Om Shankar is rather beautiful.

Merging elements from the likes of RY X and BANNERS, it’s emotive, verging on anthemic, and surely a sign of even better to come. Check out Holy Man below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
